title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The story of the fabulously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

formats.content: In my younger and more vulnerable years my father gave me some advice that Ive been turning over in my mind ever since.
In my younger and more vulnerable years my father gave me some advice that Ive been turning over in my mind ever since.
Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone, he told me, just remember that all the people in this world havent had the advantages that youve had.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: The story of young Jean Louise "Scout" Finch and her brother Jem, and their lawyer father Atticus Finch, who defends a black man accused of rape in the segregated South.

formats.content: When he was nearly thirteen, my brother Jem got his arm badly broken at the elbow.
When he was nearly thirteen, my brother Jem got his arm badly broken at the elbow.
